body.abstract: This package gives core (non-UI) access to the TCP/IP monitor. Clients can query for existing monitors, create new monitors, start/stop monitors, and listen for requests being received by a running monitor.
body.p: The MonitorCore class gives initial access to all of the API. From here you can query the existing monitors, create new ones, and add/remove a listener for monitor changes.
The IMonitor interface provides information about a particular monitor, allowing you to change it via a working copy, start/stop it, or add a listener for request activity.
